comment: She tries really hard to get you to understand what stats is all about, but answers too many questions with questions. Would prefer straight answers in class, then can think about it when the subject matter makes sense.  Exams were difficult for more (mean 71 or so).  Not good.

She is a great professor. I know many who struggled with the material, but she will help and the tests are exactly what she teaches. I didn't open the book once, but Im good with statistics, I made a 98% in the class without studying, so most ppl should be able to get an A.  Because of this class, I'm considering grad school in statistics!

Really great professor. She actually pushes you to understand what you are doing instead of spoon feeding it to you. He tests are very straight forward, no tricks. Homework is optional, but you should definitely do it. Got a B with medium effort. It is definitely possible to get an A.
She is very nice nad willing to help if you don/t understand something. Do the HW so you can do good on the test and the excel workshops
An excllent teacher and she is helpful. She knows her stuff.

Absolutely fabulous prof!! difficult subject but she explains very well and keeps it simple. Exams are long and require you to really know what you are doing - if you studied they are easy, sometimes you get to have a cheat sheet. Posts her ppts online and you don't HAVE to go to class, but she gets annoyed if you miss alot..
